content.question: According to the broadcast, what effect is the movie likely to have on the audience?

choices.label: It will cause them to question their own identity.
It will help them learn more Japanese.
It will make them think more deeply about culture.
It will make them want to travel abroad.

content.answer: It will make them think more deeply about culture.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meanings of a text.
